meanings.definition: Resembling a rose in color or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The roseolar sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and red.
meanings.sent2: Her roseolar dress was the perfect choice for the spring wedding.
meanings.sent3: The roseolar walls of the house made it look like a giant flower.
meanings.sent4: The roseolar glow of the sunrise enveloped the entire valley.
meanings.sent5: The roseolar petals of the flower glistened in the morning dew.

meanings.definition: A skin eruption characterized by rose-colored spots.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a roseolar rash on his arms.
meanings.sent2: The roseolar outbreak caused concern among the campers.
meanings.sent3: The roseolar spots on his face made him look like a human rose.
meanings.sent4: The roseolar pattern on the skin resembled a delicate floral design.
meanings.sent5: The roseolar blemishes faded away after proper treatment.
